node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #4958 及 #4962 宗個案患者的家人，自僱，在北區從事派遞工作，無外遊紀錄，9 月 6 日曾與第 #4938 宗個案患者一起到深水埗福華街萬發海鮮菜館用膳，10 日到大埔體育館接受全民檢測後確診。
node.detail_en: The patient is a family member of patients #4958 and #4962. He is self-employed and does delivery work in the North District. He has no recent travel history and had a meal with patient #4938 in Man Fat Seafood Restaurant, Fuk Wa Street, Sham Shui Po on Sept 6. He participated in the Universal Community Testing Programme on Sept 10 and was tested at the testing centre in Tai Po Sports Centre.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: King Wing House, Shan King Estate

node.location_zh: 福華街55號 萬發海鮮飯店
node.location_en: 55 Fuk Wa Street 萬發海鮮菜館
